test_files.name: AtoB Website QA Test
test_files.title: AtoB Website Functionality and Content Verification

phases.objective: Navigate to the AtoB homepage

assertions.description: Verify that the AtoB homepage loads successfully

phases.objective: Navigate to view the availability of instant transfer methods

assertions.description: Verify that instant transfer methods like Venmo, PayPal, push to debit, and Pay by email or text are displayed

phases.objective: Navigate to the section containing AtoB's banking status

assertions.description: Verify that AtoB is not a bank but maintains wallet accounts with an FDIC insured bank

phases.objective: Navigate to view the availability of customer support contact information

assertions.description: Verify that customer support phone number and email are displayed

phases.objective: Navigate to the section containing the presence of product links

assertions.description: Verify that links to Fuel Card, Driver Pay, and AtoB Perks are displayed

phases.objective: Navigate to view the presence of social media links

assertions.description: Verify that links to Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn are displayed

phases.objective: Navigate to the section containing the fuel discount information

assertions.description: Verify that the average and maximum fuel discount information is displayed

phases.objective: Navigate to the AtoB homepage

assertions.description: Verify that the homepage loads successfully

phases.objective: Scroll to the the Products section

assertions.description: Verify that 'Fuel cards' with competitive discounts and security controls are displayed
Verify that 'Driver Pay' for instant payments is displayed

phases.objective: Scroll to the the Discounts section

assertions.description: Verify that 'AtoB Truck Stop Discount Network' is displayed
Verify that 'AtoB Gas Station Discount Network' is displayed

phases.objective: Scroll to the the 'Who we serve' section

assertions.description: Verify that 'Local businesses' for short-journey fleets are displayed
Verify that 'Over the road fleets' for nationwide reach are displayed

phases.objective: Scroll to the the Partner with AtoB section

assertions.description: Verify that 'Factoring partners' for cobranded card solutions are displayed
Verify that 'Broker partners' for fuel card programs are displayed
Verify that 'Merchant partners' for the AtoB Discount Network are displayed

phases.objective: Scroll to the the Electric Vehicles section

assertions.description: Verify that the 'Electric Vehicles' section is displayed

phases.objective: Scroll to the the Blog section

assertions.description: Verify that the 'Blog' section is displayed

phases.objective: Scroll to the the About section

assertions.description: Verify that the 'About' section is displayed

phases.objective: Scroll to the the Contact Us section

assertions.description: Verify that the 'Contact Us' section is displayed

assertions.description: Verify that the homepage loads successfully

test_files.name: AtoB Website QA Test
test_files.title: AtoB Website Functionality and Content Verification

phases.objective: Navigate to the AtoB homepage

assertions.description: Verify that the AtoB homepage loads successfully

phases.objective: Navigate to view the availability of instant transfer methods

assertions.description: Verify that instant transfer methods such as Venmo, PayPal, push to debit, and Pay by email or text are displayed

phases.objective: Navigate to the section containing AtoB's banking status

assertions.description: Verify that AtoB is not a bank but maintains wallet accounts with an FDIC insured bank

phases.objective: Navigate to view the availability of customer support contact information

assertions.description: Verify that customer support phone number and email are displayed

phases.objective: Navigate to the section containing the presence of product links

assertions.description: Verify that links to Fuel Card, Driver Pay, and AtoB Perks are displayed

assertions.description: Verify that the average discount and maximum realized savings per gallon are displayed
